title: Horror Game Sound Effects
description: A collection of 518 creepy sound effects for game scenes and a trailers for a horror game.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/horror-game-sound-effects-preview

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/3bznj08kle0u93r/MSE%20-%20Horror%20Game%20Sound%20Effects.pdf?dl=0


The sound pack contains 518 high-quality sound effects for horror games, including many different hits and booms, sounds for sudden events and surprises, creepy impacts, sounds of rising pressure, monster voices with processing, risers, shutter risers and other sound effects.Â 


Use this asset to create an atmosphere of fear and creepiness for your project in fantasy, dark fantasy, horror or any other genre. Enjoy!


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 518 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 64 booms (short, long, with tail)
  • 34 sudden events
  • 16 hits, 16 hits with destruction, 16 metal hits, 16 hits with tail
  • 80 creepy impacts
  • 32 monster voices
  • 98 sounds of rising pressure
  • 24 risers, 32 shutter risers
  • 26 sound effects
  • 64 surprises
  • perfect for horror game scenes and trailers


Number of Audio Waves: 518

Number of Audio Cues: 518

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 48 minutes 45 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
